text: Hey guys, it's Ro. Welcome to another Nerdy Nummies
I got so many requests from you guys to make something from the series Riverdale
So that's exactly what we're gonna be doing today and for any of you who aren't familiar with the TV show Riverdale
It's like the Archie comics but darker
It's like if the Archie comics that I grew up reading and a murder mystery had a baby
That would be it. And the series has all the traditional characters from the comic books. They have Betty, Veronica
Archie, Jughead
One of the things I love about the series and the comics is they always meet up at Pops which is like the local diner
and the character Jughead
Loves hamburgers him and hamburgers is like meat and cookies, so I thought it would be a fun idea to make some homemade
Cookie hamburgers, so let's get started the recipe that we're making today is
A nilla cookie. So the things you'll need will be: 1 cup of all-purpose flour, 1/3 cup of sugar, 3 eggs
1 tablespoon of vanilla extract
1/4 teaspoon of salt
1/2 teaspoon of baking powder, and a 1/4 cup of melted butter. And then for the hamburger patty
We're gonna make some ganache
You'll need a 1/4 cup of cream and 1/2 cup of dark chocolate
Then to decorate you'll need some white nonpareils,
they're little balls. And to make our lettuce you'll need a little bit of green food coloring and
shredded coconut. Then for our mustard and ketchup
We'll need some yellow and red
buttercream icing. I've put them into piping bags with tips at the end for a little bit more control.
All right now let's put it all together and make some Nilla cookies.
First step to making these cookies is whisking together the dry ingredients.
In a medium bowl, add your flour, baking powder, and salt.
Then whisk together until everything is well combined and set off to the side.
Now in a large bowl, mix together your wet ingredients and sugar.
The sugar, melted butter, vanilla extract, and two eggs.
We're just gonna be adding the yolks, so set the egg whites off to the side, we don't need them.
I like to do egg white scrambles or an egg white omelette.
Then again whisk together until well combined. Break up those yolks.
We have our wet ingredients and our dry ingredients. Now pour all of the dry into the wet.
Then using a spatula, mix together until you can't see any more dry ingredients.
The cookie dough is ready this recipe is super easy. Now, wrap it up tight with some food safe plastic wrap.

Once your dough is wrapped up place it in the fridge to chill for two hours, which is the perfect amount of time to start binge-watching Riverdale, if you haven't already or to read a bunch of Archie comics.
Or both
We're trying to find a really funny one. [gasps] OOOOH, this is the story right here. Look at this

Now take a little flour and sprinkle it on your work surface so that the dough won't stick. Roll your dough to be about a quarter inch thick. Once your dough is rolled out, cut out your cookies.
I'm using a circle cookie cutter. It is an inch and a half in diameter. Because these cookies are supposed to look like hamburgers,
they'll need a top and a bottom
I'm cutting out the bottoms first, I'm going to cut out about ten.
To cut out the tops of our burgers, I'm using the same cookie cutter
But with a little trick to make them look curved
Take a piece of food safe plastic wrap, place it over the dough and cut out!
Which makes the cookie look like the top of a burger bun. The cookies are almost ready to bake

it's gonna look like sesame seeds on the top of the burger. Cookies are now ready to bake. Heat your oven to

Pour the cream into a small sauce pot then let's take it over to the stove
Place the pot on top of the stove turn your heat to medium
bring the cream to a scald you'll know it's scalding when little bubbles start to form around the

whisk together until it's shiny and smooth ganache is looking good smelling good set it off to the side to cool and thicken and the
